name: Air Strike حرب الطائرات
description:
Air Strike , air combat shooter with stunning 3D graphics alongside great audio, effects and awesome gameplay.

Features in Lite version:
* Great Missions
* Different Enemy Types
* Unique Planes
* Numerous Upgrades and Special Weapons
* Amazing Lighting and Special Effects
* Orchestral Music
* Difficulty Modes
* Arcade and Survival Mode
* Realtime Physics
* Destructible Bridges and Buildings
* WW2 Shmup with Amazing 3D environments enhanced with LightMaps and SpecularMaps
* Huge End Level Bosses

لعبة حرب طائرات افضل لعبة حرب طائرات واقوى لعبة اكشن حيث تقوم طائرتك بعمليه غزو على الاعداء و عليك ان تحرر ارضك من الاعداء وتقضي عليهم جميعاً
